title: Preferred social login ID worldwide 2016
summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The difference of Share of logins between the highest and lowest Platform is 52.99.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
The maximum Share of logins 53.1 is found at Platform Facebook and the minimum is found at Live where Platform is 0.11.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
Platform Facebook has the highest Share of logins and Live has the lowest Share of logins.
The difference of Share of logins between the highest and lowest Platform is 52.99.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Share of logins in the y axis.
The Share of logins is appeared to be the highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform Live.
Second maximum Share of logins is found at Platform GooglePlus.
The minimum Platform Live has got 482.73 times less Share of logins than the maximum Platform Facebook.
Share of logins at Platform Facebook is 53.1 , second place is GooglePlus at 44.8, and thirdly is Twitter at 1.01.
Considered together, the average Share of logins in all 7 Platforms is roughly 14.29.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 100.02.
